body:
Hi Team,

Reported a issue in this below mentioned thread kindly please help us to resolve this issue.

https://community.temporal.io/t/temporal-cassendra-failing-issue-in-kubernetes/4891

comments.body: Based on the community thread, it seems like a environment setup issue. The helm chart, as the name `temporaltest` suggest, is not meant to be used as production environment. It may be because there was only one cassandra node. But clearly the cassandra was having trouble starting up.

title: Temporal Cassendra Failing issue in Kubernetes
